Package main

Class MoveController

java.lang.Object
main.MoveController
public class MoveController extends Object
This class is used to move different Man objects inside the matrix of the Board.
Author:
Fernando Tarrino del Pozo (FernandoEsra)
See Also:
  • Man
  • Board
  • ActionsLog
  • CitizenList

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    moveAllCitizens(Board board, CitizenList citizens)
    This method read a CitizenList and, for each citizen in the list, generate one random direction (up, down, left, right) and move the citizen in that direction.
    static void
    movementLog(Man citizen)
    This method register the movement of one Man object on the ActionsLog.
    static void
    moveOneCitizenDown(Board board, Man citizen)
    This method move the citizen down X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
    static void
    moveOneCitizenLeft(Board board, Man citizen)
    This method move the citizen to the left X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
    static void
    moveOneCitizenRight(Board board, Man citizen)
    This method move the citizen to the right X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
    static void
    moveOneCitizenUp(Board board, Man citizen)
    This method move the citizen up X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.

  • Method Details

    • movementLog

      public static void movementLog(Man citizen)
      This method register the movement of one Man object on the ActionsLog.
      Parameters:
      citizen - The citizen from whom to obtain the X and Y values for the log.

    • moveOneCitizenUp

      public static void moveOneCitizenUp(Board board, Man citizen)
      This method move the citizen up X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
      Parameters:
      board - The map where the citizen will move.
      citizen - The citizen to move.

      citizen - The citizen to move.

    • moveAllCitizens

      public static void moveAllCitizens(Board board, CitizenList citizens)
      This method read a CitizenList and, for each citizen in the list, generate one random direction (up, down, left, right) and move the citizen in that direction. If is also possible that it will not move. The percentage of each direction it of the 25%.
      Parameters:
      board - The map where the citizens will move.
      citizens - The citizenList whit all the citizens in the map.
